posts.comment: You don't mess with the streets
Long way ahead, so let's do it step by step
WTF is going on? How can this not run?
Huh? What do you want from me?
Tell me and I forget. Tech me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
Nearly all man can stand adversity, but if you wan to test a man's character, give him power.
Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
Fate pulls you in different directions
It is done. I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the end. I will give unto him that is athirst of the fountain of the water of life freely.
